document.full_text: iraq has only weeks to decide if it wants to keep u.s. troops beyond an end-2011 deadline for their withdrawal, the top u.s. military officer said friday in baghdad following talks with iraq's prime minister.
document.title: iraq must decide in "weeks" on u.s. troops: admiral mullen
lines_and_colors: iraq has only weeks to decide if it wants to keep u.s. troops beyond an end-2011 deadline for their withdrawal, the top u.s. military officer said friday in baghdad following talks with iraq's prime minister.
